This is your plan, Captain?
Just sit back and let us all kill each other?
translation.ko: 뒤로 물러나 앉아서 서로 죽이는 걸 지켜보는 게요?

translation.en: You were the plan.
No one else could touch him.
Once your eyes were opened, there was no other outcome.
translation.ko: 자네가 눈을 뜨기만 하면 일이 될 거라 믿었지

translation.en: Decisions were made, Tom,
by powerful men with powerful secrets.
Captain.
They were afraid of Jack.
They asked me to help.
One day, you will pass the Chief in the hall and he will give you a nod.
translation.ko: 언젠가 청장님이 지나가다 자네한테 고개를 끄덕이면

translation.en: And you will know why.
Because you were right, Tom.
We do need you.
